pullrequest.title: Added camera intrinsics (fx, fy, cx, cy, s).

content.raw:
For using the image\_proc it is necessary to fill the camera info with the intrinsics and distortion parameters:

* [https://github.com/inesc-tec-robotics/gazebo\_projection\_mapping/blob/hydro-devel/worlds/camera\_intrinsics.world#L107](https://github.com/inesc-tec-robotics/gazebo_projection_mapping/blob/hydro-devel/worlds/camera_intrinsics.world#L107)

For that I created a pull request for gazebo\_ros\_pkgs \(adding support for fx and fy, the rest were already implemented\):

* [https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo\_ros\_pkgs/pull/374](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/374)

‌
content.html:
For using the image_proc it is necessary to fill the camera info with the intrinsics and distortion parameters:

  • https://github.com/inesc-tec-robotics/gazebo_projection_mapping/blob/hydro-devel/worlds/camera_intrinsics.world#L107

For that I created a pull request for gazebo_ros_pkgs (adding support for fx and fy, the rest were already implemented):

  • https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/374
